name: Observer (lucaszilke)
description:
WARNING!

This game contains flashing lights. 

------------

Made in 32 Hours for the Minijam 129 - Theme : You're not the Hero

------------

In this first-person horror game, you play as a Private Investigator who is sent to a small town to find a missing person. But as you explore the town, you realize that there's much more going on than meets the eye. The town is covered in a thick, unnatural fog, and supernatural threats lurk around every corner. You'll need to use your wit, observational skills, and trusty camera to survive and uncover the truth.

------------

CONTROLS:

Can be changed in Settings - Default Settings:

W/A/S/D : Move
RMB : Use Camera
LMB : Use Flash
E : Interact
